meaningMnemonic: The most <kanji>mysterious</kanji> thing that's <kanji>connected</kanji> to a house is the <vocabulary>entranceway</vocabulary>. When you're walking into one you never know what's coming next. You just take off your shoes and hope the rest of the house isn't really weird or something. If it is, the <vocabulary>entryway</vocabulary> is then your only way out.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
